channel.title: No more WhonixCheck tool in Whonix?
channel.description: I typed 'upgrade-nonroot' and saw that whonixcheck package is going to be removed from Whonix system. I love that package so much so I don't want it to be removed during dist upgrade. Are you going to completely remove it? Thank you.

item.title: No more WhonixCheck tool in Whonix?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
See release announcement / changelog.

Whonix for VirtualBox - 15.0.1.7.2 - Point Release!

whonixcheck -> systemcheck

Read full topic
item.source: No more WhonixCheck tool in Whonix?

item.title: No more WhonixCheck tool in Whonix?
item.dc:creator: helpmeplzz
item.description:
I typed ‘upgrade-nonroot’ and saw that whonixcheck package is going to be removed from Whonix system. I love that package so much so I don’t want it to be removed during dist upgrade. Are you going to completely remove it? Thank you.

Read full topic
item.source: No more WhonixCheck tool in Whonix?
